text:
="preserve">Eugenio Scarpellini (8 January 1954 – 15 July 2020) was an Italian-born Bolivian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1974. He was titular bishop of "Bida" and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of El Alto, Bolivia from 2010 to 2013 and as bishop of the El Alto Diocese from 2013 until his death in 2020.
Scarpellini died from COVID-19 during the pandemic in Bolivia on 15 July 2020, aged 66.

annotations.surface_form: Roman Catholic Diocese of El Alto
